mapper.select: SELECT num, name, title, content, read_count as readCount, write_date as writeDate FROM TB_BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD (num, name, title, content, read_count, write_date) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(num)+1, 1) FROM TB_BOARD), #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{readCount}, #{writeDate})
